description:
**ESXi**

This dashboard provides an overview of your [ESXi](https://www.vmware.com/products/esxi-and-esx.html) and vSphere deployment. It focuses on information about Host and VM performance.

**Useful Links**

* [Integration Documentation](https://docs.datadoghq.com/integrations/esxi)
* [ESXi Documentation](https://www.vmware.com/products/esxi-and-esx.html)
* [vSphere Documentation](https://www.vmware.com/products/vsphere.html)
* [vSphere Integration Documentation](https://docs.datadoghq.com/integrations/vsphere)
title: ESXi Overview

definition.content:
**ESXi**

This dashboard provides an overview of your ESXi hosts and the vSphere VMs running on them.
The overview section gives you a high-level overview of your environment, including your ESXi hosts and VMs

definition.title: Highest Latency across all Datastores used by Host
